Projectiles

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projectiles.Projectile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleShell

    public abstract class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic class for all projectiles

    • Method Detail

      • hitScreenAction

        protected abstract void hitScreenAction(Point shooterPosition,
                   int ref)
        The action that takes places when the projectile hits the screen
        Parameters:
        shooterPosition - the position from which the shooter fires
        ref - reference distance

      • shoot

        public abstract void shoot(int dist,
         Point shooterPosition)
        The action that takes place when the projectile is propagating. At each propagation step, the shape of the projectile changes due to the corrosive atmosphere
        Parameters:
        dist - distance between the shooter and the screen
        shooterPosition - the position from which the shooter fires
